quests.title: Eliminate Bugs
quests.description: Clear out bugs. End the game with a killcount of at least 200. Should be easy for a rookie.

quests.title: Gather Samples
quests.description: Collect  samples from the local flora. Extract with at least 10 samples.

quests.title: Glasscanon
quests.description: You may only dive with light armor next round.

quests.title: Paint the Town Red
quests.description: You may only use stratagems from the orbital and eagle category

quests.title: Explosion Specialist
quests.description: You may only use weapons with splash damage (eg.: exploding crossbow, purifyer). Non explosive support weapons are forbidden.

quests.title: Quicky
quests.description: Extract from a 40 minute mission within 15 minutes having it completed.
